name: FOOD FIGHT !
description:
This game is a 2 PC Multiplayer game.

Each player control a team of Fruits or Veggies, they have to manage their resources, spawn units over time to build an army and obliterate the ennemy !
The more Barracks you have, the longer the respawn will be, but you will have more units per minute.

This game was made in a 48hours Gamejam organized by Ubisoft, Ludia and Behaviour.
Special thanks to NAD School Montreal.
